title: Internationales Modul
descriptionEn: Study abroad or International Elective Module.

goals.title: Internationales Modul (Gesamt)
goals.description: 30 ECTS: Entweder Auslandssemester oder MCBL-Kurse + Schlüsselqualifikationen.
goals.descriptionEn: 30 ECTS: Either semester abroad or MCBL courses + key qualifications.

goals.title: Auslandsstudium
goals.description: Ein Semester an einer Partnerhochschule (30 ECTS).
goals.descriptionEn: One semester at a partner university (30 ECTS).

goals.title: Master of Comparative Business Law Kurse
goals.titleEn: Master of Comparative Business Law Courses
goals.description: Englischsprachige Kurse aus dem MCBL an der Uni Mannheim.
goals.descriptionEn: English-taught courses from the MCBL at Uni Mannheim.

goals.title: Schlüsselqualifikationen (Sprache)
goals.descriptionEn: e.g. French Law and Legal Language.
